title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - The next frontier: Building the agentic future of Financial Services (INV209)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 下一个前沿：构建金融服务的智能体未来 (INV209)
abstract: AI agents have made financial institutions more productive, efficient, and secure. But a more autonomous financial system—defined by innovations like inter-agent payments, real-time underwriting, hyper-personalized customer service, and customized lending offers—represents the industry’s next frontier. This session explores how we will get there...and beyond. After outlining a vision for the agentic future of Financial Services, we’ll hear from two customers who will share how they are building the infrastructure for AI systems that independently execute complex financial operations. We’ll learn how they are architecting these systems for compliance and scalability and what it takes to run autonomous agents in production.
abstract_cn: AI代理已使金融机构变得更高效、更有生产力且更安全。但更自主的金融系统——以代理间支付、实时承保、超个性化客户服务和定制化贷款方案等创新为特征——代表着该行业的下一个前沿领域。本次会议将探讨我们如何到达那里……以及更远的未来。在概述金融服务代理化未来的愿景后,我们将听取两位客户的分享,了解他们如何构建能够独立执行复杂金融操作的AI系统基础设施。我们将了解他们如何为合规性和可扩展性设计这些系统架构,以及在生产环境中运行自主代理所需的条件。

presenter.name: Erik Reppel
presenter.title: Head of Engineering, Coinbase Developer Platform
